tiralabra.gui

Class MouseInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • tiralabra.gui.MouseInput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, EventListener, MouseInputListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BuildGraph, ChainPolygon, FreeDraw, InsertPoint, JoinPolygons, MoveOrDeletePoint, MoveOrDeletePolygon, SetEndPoints, ShowUnobstructed

    public class MouseInput
extends Object
implements MouseInputListener
    Handles mouse input. Can be extended to implement differrent commands.
    Author:
    Pavel
